## CommonModulus
## 题目代码
```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *

flag = bytes_to_long("n1book{c0mm0n_m0du1u5_4ttacK}")

p = getStrongPrime(1024)
q = getStrongPrime(1024)
n = p * q
e1 = 65537
e2 = 114514191981019

c1 = pow(flag, e1, n)
c2 = pow(flag, e2, n)
print n
print c1
print c2

# 
# 
# 
```
## 题目Flag
n1book{c0mm0n_m0du1u5_4ttacK}

## WriteUp
关注Nu1L Team公众号，回复7-crypto-wp-6获取WP
